From: Canteen.Lunch@chalhoub.com <Canteen.Lunch@chalhoub.com>
To: HO1Canteen
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-01-03 09:34
Subject: Lunch in the Canteen(January 6-10)
--------------------------------------------------





It’s time to book your canteen meals!

Let us know if you’re having lunch at the canteen next week!

If you haven’t already booked your meals for next week, please take a moment to do it now.



For those who did not make their booking in advance, we appreciate if you can come and have your lunch 1:40 onwards.



 	 Select dates and canteens <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.e-mac.com%2Fen%2FPages%2Fcanteen.aspx&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cf9a6d9012df3449155a108dd2bb8504c%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638714792864751697%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=UotiEpElEejM9rerkvS4C%2FqThowhgd6FUeEZZhmwH6E%3D&reserved=0> 	  	 Unsubscribe <mailto:ITServiceDesk@chalhoub.com?subject=Please remove my email address from email distribution list Ho1canteen@chalhoub.com> 	  	 



If you are a new joiner and would like to register to the canteen, please contact IT Service Desk. 

To stop receiving our canteen booking emails, please Unsubscribe!
